mapper.select: SELECT b_num, user_id, b_title, b_cont, b_cate, b_hit, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt, b_visit_cnt FROM board WHERE b_num = #{bNum}

SELECT B.b_num, B.user_id, B.b_title, B.b_cont, B.b_cate, B.b_hit, B.reg_dt, B.mod_id, B.mod_dt, B.rnum AS no, B.b_visit_cnt FROM ( SELECT bo.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt ) AS rnum FROM board bo )B WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size})
